meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Balaji Narain Heather Anstaett Jay Peterson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6230.

td.p: Balaji Narain, an attorney originally from Cumming, Georgia
Heather Anstaett, an auditor from West Palm Beach, Florida
Jay Peterson, an English professor from Howell, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,201)

tr.td: THE SONG DYNASTY
WEATHER GEAR
STATE OF THE NOVEL
(Alex: You identify the state in which the novel's action takes place.)
THAT'S "UN" CALLED FOR!
PHYSICS
CATCHING A BREAK
